vignette.name: Accessing Object Reference Pages

ul.li: Select an object in an unlocked patcher.
Choose Open "object" Reference from the Help menu ("object" will be the name of the object selected)
The reference page for the selected object will be opened in any existing documentation window. If no documentation window is currently visible, a new one will be opened.

vignette.bodytext: There are also links to object reference pages in an object's file browser preview and its help file.
